level.text: An action affecting a conservation easement may be brought by 1 of the following:
An owner of an interest in the real property burdened by the easement;
A person having a third-party right of enforcement; or
A person authorized by other law.
This chapter does not affect the power of a court to modify or terminate a conservation easement in accordance with the principles of law and equity.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-113
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-113, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-201.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 3 of the Uniform Conservation Easement Act.
